name: creepiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being strange or unnatural and making you feel frightened: The quiet just added to the creepiness of the place. At Hallowe'en, we celebrate screams, spooks, ghouls, and general creepiness.
the quality of being unpleasant and making you feel uncomfortable, especially because of sexual behaviour that is not wanted or not appropriate: There is an element of creepiness in many of the characters he portrays. He was known for general creepiness around women.
More examplesFewer examplesthe creepiness of an abandoned hotelThere's a certain low-budget creepiness to this film.Creepiness by itself isn't a crime.These acts may not be illegal, but can't you understand their creepiness?
